## Plotting functions

- [`plot_bivariate()`](GHRexplore-reference/plot_bivariate.Rd.qmd): Plots a bivariate graph to visually assess associations.

- [`plot_combine()`](GHRexplore-reference/plot_combine.Rd.qmd): Combines plots, each representing one variable, into a single plot.

- [`plot_compare()`](GHRexplore-reference/plot_compare.Rd.qmd): Combines multiple plots of several variables in a single graph.

- [`plot_correlation()`](GHRexplore-reference/plot_correlation.Rd.qmd): Plots a correlation matrix of a series of variables.

- [`plot_heatmap()`](GHRexplore-reference/plot_heatmap.Rd.qmd): Plots temporal heatmaps of covariates, case counts, or
 incidence rates.

- [`plot_map()`](GHRexplore-reference/plot_map.Rd.qmd): Plots a choropleth map of covariates, case counts, or incidence
 rates.

- [`plot_multiple()`](GHRexplore-reference/plot_multiple.Rd.qmd): Produces a list of multiple plots of the same type, each
 representing one variable.

- [`plot_seasonality()`](GHRexplore-reference/plot_seasonality.Rd.qmd): Plots yearly time series of covariates, case counts, or incidence
 rates to explore seasonality patterns.

- [`plot_timeseries()`](GHRexplore-reference/plot_timeseries.Rd.qmd): Plots time series of covariates, case counts, or incidence rates.


## Utils

- [`GHR_palette()`](GHRexplore-reference/GHR_palette.Rd.qmd): Generates color palettes including custom, ColorBrewer and
 colorspace palettes.

- [`GHRexplore-package()`](GHRexplore-reference/GHRexplore-package.Rd.qmd): A collection of commonly used visualizations of temporal and spatio-temporal health data including case counts, incidence rates, and covariates.

- [`aggregate_cases()`](GHRexplore-reference/aggregate_cases.Rd.qmd): Aggregates a data frame containing disease cases in space and/or
 time.

- [`aggregate_cov()`](GHRexplore-reference/aggregate_cov.Rd.qmd): Aggregates a data frame containing a covariate of interest in
 space and/or time.

- [`dengue_SP()`](GHRexplore-reference/dengue_SP.Rd.qmd): Data frame containing the weekly number of notified dengue cases in
 the municipality of  Sao Paulo , as well as a set of climatic covariates.

- [`map_MS()`](GHRexplore-reference/map_MS.Rd.qmd): Administrative boundaries (polygon geometries) of the 11 municipalities
 in  Mato Grosso do Sul  (Brazil) to be used with the  dengue_MS  data set.
